item.title: Kingsport, BC Customs Station
item.description: Customs Canada at End of US-95 North

item.title: US-Canada Border - Eastport, ID/Kingsgate, BC
item.description: The international bounday between United States and Canada at the Easport,ID/Kingsgate, BC border crossing. The picture is taken right on the international boundary. You can see a swath of trees cut down at the border itself, and you can see that same swath as a notch at the top of the ridge in the background. United States is to the left - Canada to the right.
